attributes.action: explain for the benefit of public education, a government function, what exactly is money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Money and the love of money and the importance of "business" has come to dominate our lives.  Some of us are fat cats, some wage slaves and some of us can not even get a job.  Business and Capitalism seem to be the be all and end all even Television and Radio have devoted 'business' slots.  When we reflect and more importantly come to fully realise that financial services and institutions really do absolutely nothing of social value - will we find a better way to live than with the love of 'money.'

rejection.details: The question posed in the title of your petition does not relate to any specific government policy.
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
